title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message when there is no data for series
description: When there is no data for a series, there should be a friendly error message to remind the user.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed to the user.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should pop up to remind the user.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the series that has no data.
3. Observe that no error message is displayed when there is no data for the series.
